alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chambers County through 315 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Five Points, or near Stroud, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lanett, Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Lakeview, Five Points, Chambers County Lake, Fredonia, Post Oak Forks, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Huguley, Amity Park, Standing Rock, Welch, Buffalo, Southern Harbor, White Plains, Rocky Point and Stroud Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
